articles.title: Elon Musk’s xAI is reportedly seeking a $4.3B equity raise - TechCrunch
articles.summary: Elon Musk’s xAI is reportedly seeking a $4. 3B equity raise Elon Musk’s startup xAI is trying to raise a $4. 3 billion equity investment, according to a report from Bloomberg. This equity funding would be in addition to the $5 billion that Musk is allegedly trying to raise in debt funding for the combined entity of X and xAI.
